Uses of Interface
edu.sjsu.cs151.controller.Message

    • Uses of Message in edu.sjsu.cs151.controller

      Classes in edu.sjsu.cs151.controller that implement Message 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EndGameMessage
      This class represents an "end game" event sent from the View when the user presses "Quitgame"
      class  MoveMessage
      This class represents an attempted move event sent from the View when the user drags a chess piece
      class  NewGameMessage
      This class represents a "new game" event sent from the View
      class  PlayerChosenMessage
      This class represents the color selected by the user in the View.
      Methods in edu.sjsu.cs151.controller with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ValveResponses EndGameValve.execute​(Message message)
      ValveResponse execute method checks class types of incoming Messages and only executes them if they are a EndGameMessage.
      ValveResponses MoveValve.execute​(Message message)
      ValveResponse execute method checks class types of incoming Messages and only executes them if they are a MoveMessage.
      ValveResponses NewGameValve.execute​(Message message)
      ValveResponse execute method checks class types of incoming Messages and only executes them if they are a NewGameMessage.
      ValveResponses PlayerChosenMessageValve.execute​(Message message)
      ValveResponse execute method checks class types of incoming Messages and only executes them if they are a PlayerChosenMessage.
      ValveResponses Valve.execute​(Message message)  
      Method parameters in edu.sjsu.cs151.controller with type arguments of type Message

      Method that prints the messages or throws an exception
